summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4029 for the improvement of 30th Avenue South from McClellan Street to Mt. Baker Boulevard and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48785, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
